attributes.action: Help Shorten The Time Band A's and B's Sould Be Allowed To Bid On LOCATA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A and B Band members of the widely used Locata Housing System are preventing others of a home. They are in the band due to domestic Violence and eviction reasons but yet they take up to a year to decide to bid. 
We the undersigned would like a time limit posted to these bands of 3mths otherwise should be put into the next lower band.

rejection.details: Your petition needs more detail in the main sentence so people know exactly what they are signing up to
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
